description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76044-PROSTATE GLAND: Transurethral Prostatic Resection (TUR), Enucleation Specimen (Subtotal Prostatectomy).

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_WEIGHT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Weight.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_GREAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Greatest Size.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: PERINEURAL_INVASN_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Perineural Invasion.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cannot be assessed


Not identified


Absent


Present


Indeterminate


Portal vein invasion present


Hepatic vein invasion present


Present within tumor nodules


Present in vessels of parenchyma outside of tumor nodules


Cannot be determined

columns.name: SEMINAL_VESICLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Seminal Vesicle Invasion. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not identified


Present


No seminal vesicle present

columns.name: PERIPROSTATIC_FAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Periprostatic Fat Invasion. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not identified


Present

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: HISTOLOGIC_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not applicable


GX: Cannot be assessed


G1: Well differentiated


G2: Moderately differentiated


G3: Poorly differentiated


G4: Undifferentiated


G4: Undifferentiated / anaplastic


WHO grade not assigned


Low-grade (well-differentiated to moderately differentiated)


High-grade (poorly differentiated to undifferentiated)


FIGO Grade 1


FIGO Grade 2


FIGO Grade 3


Favorable (purely epithelial, fetal subtype, mitotically inactive with <=2 mitoses in


Less favorable (all subtypes other than those designated "Favorable" or "Unfavorable"


Unfavorable (small cell undifferentiated or rhabdoid as the predominant or sole histo


Gleason Pattern


Ungraded sarcoma


pGX: Grade cannot be assessed


pG1: Spindle cell melanoma


pG2: Mixed cell melanoma


pG3: Epithelioid cell melanoma


WHO Grade I


WHO Grade II


WHO Grade III


WHO Grade IV


pG1: Well differentiated


pG2: Moderately differentiated


pG3: Poorly differentiated


pG4: Undifferentiated


FNCLCC Grade 1


FNCLCC Grade 2


FNCLCC Grade 3


Grade 1


Grade 2


Grade 3

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Total Gleason Score.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Total Number of Chips.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specimen Size Specify.

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Enucleation Specimens - Proportion (%) of prostatic tissue involved by tumor.

columns.name: TUR_SPE_TUMOR_QT_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: TUR Specimens - Tumor Quantitation. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Tmr histologic finding in no more than 5% of tissue resected with Gleason 2 to 6 


Tmr histologic finding in no more than 5% of tissue resected or Gleason 7 to 10
